mapper.sql: ID, DATE_KEY, ORG_CODE, XS_AMT, XS_QTY, XS_ZH_ML, XS_ZY_SR, XS_ML, XS_LR
mapper.select:
SELECT u.ORG_CODE, u.XS_AMT, u.XS_QTY, u.XS_ML, u.XS_LR, u.rowNo FROM ( SELECT ORG_CODE, SUM(XS_AMT) AS XS_AMT, SUM(XS_QTY) AS XS_QTY, MAX (XS_ML) AS XS_ML, MAX (XS_LR) AS XS_LR, (@rowNum :=@rowNum + 1) AS rowNo FROM hty_fct_sale_org_all, (SELECT(@rowNum := 0)) b
GROUP BY ORG_CODE ORDER BY XS_AMT ) u WHERE ORG_CODE = #{searchDTO.userId}
mapper.insert: insert into hty_fct_sale_org_all (ID, DATE_KEY, ORG_CODE, XS_AMT, XS_QTY, XS_ZH_ML, XS_ZY_SR, XS_ML, XS_LR) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xsQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xsZhMl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xsZySr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xsMl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xsLr,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into hty_fct_sale_org_all
ID,
DATE_KEY,
ORG_CODE,
XS_AMT,
XS_QTY,
XS_ZH_ML,
XS_ZY_SR,
XS_ML,
XS_LR,

#{xsLr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update hty_fct_sale_org_all
DATE_KEY = #{dateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XS_AMT = #{xsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XS_QTY = #{xsQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
XS_ZH_ML = #{xsZhMl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XS_ZY_SR = #{xsZySr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XS_ML = #{xsMl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XS_LR = #{xsLr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update hty_fct_sale_org_all set DATE_KEY = #{dateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XS_AMT = #{xsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XS_QTY = #{xsQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, XS_ZH_ML = #{xsZhMl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XS_ZY_SR = #{xsZySr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XS_ML = #{xsMl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XS_LR = #{xsLr,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
